wikipedia_page.main: Rowen Shepherd (born 25 December 1970, Edinburgh, Scotland) is a former Scottish international rugby union player, who played for Scotland. He was capped twenty times for Scotland between 1995 and 1998.

For a short period, Stark - along with international teammates Rowen Shepherd and Gregor Townsend - owned a bar in Edinburgh's Grassmarket area. The bar was aptly named The Three Quarters.
